relevant_findings.lung_examination: Crackles at the bases of both lungs.

skin_examination.description: Coalescing papules and plaques covering most of the skin surface with desquamation involving approximately half the surface of the back.

relevant_findings.eye_examination: Purulent discharge and erosions on eyelids, trace injection of the conjunctiva, and serous crusting on the lips.

skin_examination.description: Confluent macular erythema on the face, trunk, and limbs, extending to the knees; innumerable nonfollicular pustules, 1 to 2 mm in diameter; extensive areas of superficial desquamation on the back with a positive Nikolsky’s sign; targetoid macules and plaques on trunk, legs, and palms.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Skin involvement was estimated to be approximately 76% of body-surface area.
